<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b268ae-c60c-45dc-2f73-3d7fa7009b09#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A palást</string>
            <string language="en">the cloak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Mantel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le manteau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o casaco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il mantello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο επενδύτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el capote</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A palást bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">introduction of the cloak</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">palást,  miseruha,  Krisztus,  angyalok,  Gizella,  </string>
            <string language="en">cloak,chasuble, saman tree, saman, avar mytholog, Christ, angels, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung des Mantels</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">introduction du manteau</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">introdução do casaco</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">introduzione del mantello</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εισαγωγή του επενδύτη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">introducción del capote</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mantel, chasuble, saman Baum, saman, avar mytholog, 
Christ, Engel, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">manteau, arbre chasuble et saman, mytholog saman et 
avar, le Christ, anges, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">casaco, árvore chasuble, saman, mytholog saman, avar, 
Christ, angels, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mantello, albero chasuble e saman, mytholog saman e 
avar, Christ, angeli, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επενδύτης, φαιλόνιο, saman δέντρο, saman, avar 
mytholog, Χριστός, άγγελοι, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">capote, árbol chasuble, saman, mytholog saman, avar, 
Cristo, ángeles, gisella</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

        </lifeCycle>

          <taxonPath>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
